name: Risa Gaull
what_you_do: Risa Gaull offers self-love and relationship coaching, guiding women to embrace self-love and transform their relationships through personalized coaching and group programs.
who_you_serve: Risa serves women seeking deeper, heart-centered relationships in love, friendship, and family.
